affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
cmb:
120/130/140/150
10
lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
name: bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss

desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.
cmb: 12/10/8/6
lore: Whispering an enchantment he learned from Soruq to his faithful blades, Gondar targets vital tendons and joints to disable his opponents.
name: bounty_hunter_jinada

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.
notes:
Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.
The bonus damage is a separate instance, and isn't considered in Jinada's calculation.
cmb:
50/50/50/50
15
lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of its location, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.
notes:
Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.
Gives True Sight as well as shared vision of the target.
Track's effect is only visible to allies.
The allies that are receiving the bonus speed from Track are the ones that will receive the bonus gold.
Bonus gold is reliable gold.
attrib:
SPEED RADIUS: 900/900/900
BONUS SPEED: 20%/20%/20%
BONUS GOLD FOR SELF: 200/275/350
BONUS GOLD FOR ALLIES: 50/100/150
DURATION: 30/30/30
CAST RANGE: 1200
cmb:
50
4
lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
name: bounty_hunter_track
